name: Pages UI/UX Design Component Kit FIgma
description:
The long awaited Pages UI kit comes to Figma!

Our team at Revox is so thrilled to announce the official Figma Community Version of Pages, the revolutionary design system built for the Bootstrap ecosystem for native HTML, Angular, and React. Pages is based on the Bootstrap design system.


Go beyond Figma!

If you love our Figma UI kit and want to build actual web apps using our framework! Go check out our fully componentized HTML, Angular, and React versions HERE!


Interact with us!

Comment down below for any questions or remember to join our Discord to chat with us about anything!
